PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_NAME: res, list of 7 elements such that:
PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: res(1): integer returning the number of hosts (pvmds) in the virtual machine.

PARAM_INDENT.P: res(2): integer returning the number of different data formats being used.
res(3): integer returning pvmd task ID for host.
res(4): character string returning name of host.
res(5): character string returning architecture name of host
res(6): integer returning relative speed of host. Default value is 1000.
res(7): integer status code returned by the routine.

DESCRIPTION.P: pvm_config returns information about the present virtual machine. The information returned is similar to that available from the console command.
The pvm_config function returns information about the entire virtual machine in one call.
The returned value res(7)will be zero if the call is successful and will be will be < 0 if some error occurs.
